hair_services.title: Haircut & Styling
hair_services.view_details: Includes cut, style, and blow dry
hair_services.description: Get a stylish and trendy haircut along with a blow dry to add volume and shine to your hair.

hair_services.title: Hair Spa
hair_services.description: Revitalize your hair with a luxurious hair spa treatment that hydrates and strengthens dry, damaged hair.

hair_services.title: Keratin Treatment
hair_services.description: A hair treatment that makes your hair smooth, shiny, and frizz-free for long-lasting results.

hair_services.title: Root Touch Up
hair_services.view_details: Cover grey hair with hair color
hair_services.description: A quick and efficient service to cover greys and restore your natural hair color.

hair_services.title: Hair Color
hair_services.description: Transform your hair with a vibrant and long-lasting hair color that suits your personality.

hair_services.title: Blow Dry
hair_services.description: Perfect for a special event or daily styling, this service gives your hair the volume and shine it needs.

hair_services.title: Hair Straightening
hair_services.description: Say goodbye to frizzy hair with a long-lasting hair straightening treatment.
